entries.prose_result_same: The selector is unwavering and remains seated on %TT (%TO).
entries.prose_result_change: The selector pops at the last minute and comes to a stop on %TT (%TO).
entries.prose_wheel_slow: The wheel slows down and it appears the number will be... %TT (%TO).
entries.wheel_begin_slow: The wheel begins to slow down...
entries.prose_starting_in: The next game begins in %DI seconds.
entries.prose_payout: You receive a payout of %DI bank credits!
entries.bet_failed: The system was unable to process your bet.
entries.bet_failed_amt: You have entered an invalid amount. Please try again.
entries.player_broke: You do not have any money to bet.
entries.bet_failed_distance: You are too far from the game station to complete the bet.
entries.prose_player_join: You join the station for a game of %TO.
entries.prose_station_full: The selected %TT is completely occupied and may not accept new players.
entries.winner_to_other1: %TO winds and receives 1 credit as %PO earnings.
entries.winner_to_winner1: You win and receive 1 credit as your earnings.
entries.winner_to_other: %TO wins and receives %DI credits as %PO earnings.
entries.winner_to_winner: You win and receive %DI credits as your earnings.
